Paragraph: AC Milan ( 9 ) v Udinese ( 11 ) 1330

2. Udinese

These are the two teams mentioned in the paragraph, and in soccer, teams are often associated with specific locations. In this case, AC Milan is located in Milan, Italy, and Udinese is located in Udine, Italy. However, the paragraph does not explicitly state these locations, so the entities identified are just the team names. If more context or information is provided, it may be possible to identify the specific locations as well.

2. Udine (the location associated with Udinese)
